pkgmetadata.longdescription: Infinite-Jackknife-Based Standard Errors for 'brms' Models // Provides a function to calculate infinite-jackknife-based standard errors for fixed effects parameters in 'brms' models, handling both clustered and non-clustered data. References: Ji et al. (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2407.09772; Giordano et al. (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2305.06466.
